articles.title: Carlos Alcaraz crashes out of Aussie Open with loss to Zverev - ESPN
articles.description: Alexander Zverev made no mistake with his second chance to close out a win over No. 2-ranked Carlos Alcaraz and moved into an Australian Open semifinal against two-time finalist Daniil Medvedev.
articles.content:
Jan 24, 2024, 09:31 AM ET
Alexander Zverev made no mistake with his second chance to close out a win over No. 2-ranked Carlos Alcaraz on Wednesday night and moved into an Australian Open semifinal a… [+2150 chars]
